website_summaries.verdict: An attractive 4 person table that works well in informal kitchen nooks or dining areas.
pros: Comes in several paint colors and finishes
cons: Check the box before assembling as some tables arrive without all the right components

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for small space
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! We have a very small cottage style house and I was looking for a durable- affordable table to fit the space. I have had this table for several months now and it doesn’t wobble or anything and we have two young boys who aren’t very gentle on furniture. It is the perfect table for a small eating space! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica James-Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful and sturdy. Easy to assemble. Great quality for the price. I have it in my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Gelmin Portillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy table for the price. Was disappointed the legs are so thin, it gives it that less expensive look. I do wish I had spent the extra money and got one with a thicker base. It did come with a scratch but touch up paint is on the way. It’s made of Asian wood, to me its almost plastic looking, doesn’t look painted, more like coated. Would I buy it again, no. Shipping was super fast!
customer_reviews.author: ginadoll

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Love it!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small house! Great quality. Great price. Fast delivery. We have two older chairs that suit this table nicely. It serves as my little "sit and eat" table, but last night, we pulled up two extra chairs, and we had a cozy dinner for four! Don't hesitate to buy! This is a sweet table.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieNeal

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect..but beware.
customer_reviews.text: Love this table but watch out for the fact that it comes in two different packages. We got only the table top delivered with no dowel to connect the legs to and so we sent the top and legs back and the next day a second package arrived with the missing dowel.....now we had no table top so we had to recorder the top, but I am happy that we saw it through because the table is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Table is not WHITE
customer_reviews.text: Great table, but it's not the color shown in the photos. We ordered white, the box said white and the table is 100 percent ivory. Look at my photos, you will see a white plate and white piece of paper on the table, against the "white table", and it's clearly not even close. Luckily our walls are off white so it's not horrible but it does look a little off next to our white rug... disappointed it didn't arrive as described but we desperately needed a table so we kept it. Coloring is the reason for the lower star rating. :/
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table, amazingly low price!
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, super sturdy, and very well made! Assembly was simple--I have never assembled anything before, and much to the shock of those who know me, I did it by myself in about a half an hour. This table looks much, much more expensive than I paid. It is lovely in my kitchen nook. It also arrived only 3 days after I ordered it! I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: St Aug Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality table for low price
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! This is a perfect table for small spaces like a kitchen nook, small apartment, etc. The table is made very well and it looks more expensive than it is. It is pretty easy to assemble even though there are some hard to reach areas with putting the legs together. It literally took my husband 15min top to complete. For anyone hesitant on getting this table just do it. It is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size; Quality Product; Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I received this table today ... two days early! It came in two boxes and was very well packaged. All of the necessary parts were there, and the instructions were easy to follow. I put the table together by myself, and it was surprisingly easy to do considering the fact that it is a fairly heavy table. I purchased the black pedestal with the black and cherry wood top. It is very pretty, and the size is perfect for my small eating area. I have now ordered a matching set of chairs from the same company now that I know the quality they provide. I highly recommend this table based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: Love this little table
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table! It was the perfect size for my small kitchen nook! I paired it with benches and it fits perfectly! The table was easy to put together, and I was very impressed with the heaviness and the gorgeous wood! I thought maybe the table would be cheaply made for the price that I paid, but that was not the case! This is easily a $300 or more table!
customer_reviews.author: salomephoto

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHAPE 🧚👌 @ Parts could be DISASTER
customer_reviews.text: It is GORGEOUS TABLE. We do love it!!:))) The shape and paint feels like ''candy" - give very pleasant feelings!:) Looks like easy to assemble:) Fast delivery:) Great price:) Color (white) came not white. BUT our table has luxshery amazing light-coffee color - VERY BEAUTIFUL:)) BUT. Came without leg!! And with damage on the table top!! **I do not believe that seller is interested about returns/ complains! I believe that co-worker who's duty - to pay attention to problems with product - HATE BOSS (seller) Mine Anniversary Gift DISASTER🤔😔 I'm thinking maybe to reorder the new one from the same seller (so much we like this table)!
customer_reviews.author: KATETYNA ORLOVA

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep it's color
customer_reviews.text: I've had the table for 3 months only, I barely use it to dine on and it's already looking like an old table. It's loosing it's color and turning a gray dirty color. Also you can see lines across the surface of the table. Very disappointed, I don't recommend this product. You're better off spending a little more. I'm only 3 months in and already looking to buy another table. I will definitely spend more money this time but know I will have a table that will last me at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Yamila

customer_reviews.title: Affordable beauty
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful, elegant table. The cherry color is warm and elegant. This table is made of real wood which is such a wonderful treat compared to pressed wood or other material. The construction is flawless, and it was very easy to put it together. I am an older short female and I did it alone and had no trouble at all. Bought the two chairs that are recommended with it, and that makes a wonderful dining set. So glad I chose this. Made in Vietnam - excellent craftsmanship.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful round breakfast table
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what our kitchen breakfast nook needed. It was so easy to put together and is very sturdy. The size is perfect. I will probably by chairs by the same manufacturer to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Millet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the foyer
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful table! I purchased this to go into our foyer and it is the perfect fit! My fiancé continues to comment on how expensive it looks. It is a bit darker than I originally planned, but it is still very beautiful! It could probably fit four small chairs or two large if used in a breakfast nook.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Augter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took me about 30 minutes, but I took my time. The included wrench is worthless; much easier to use a socket wrench. Everything fit together perfectly. The hardest part for me was flipping it back over when I was finished. Nice and sturdy. You "can" sit 4 at the table, but you'll be close and it won't be a 5 course meal! The wood is beautiful. Yes, it's real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho Libra

customer_reviews.title: Very Affordable Table for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: We have had this table for a little over a year now. It is really cute and fits well in small spaces such as a kitchen nook. I love the look of it and you can't beat the price. The only thing that is driving me crazy is that it marks so easily. Obviously a white table will show almost everything but in trying to clean it off, it is as if the finish just absorbs whatever has landed on it. So if you get this table in white, keep a lot of those magic erasers on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ekvall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dining table !!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table!! sturdy ! Easy to assemble. Received both packages the same day, The table top and the legs. Shipping was also very fast 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not white
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, wanted something small for breakfast nook. It’s also very easy to assemble, and legs have little adjusters on the bottom to prevent it from being wobbly. I would give 5 starts but table is supposed to be linen white but it’s much greyer than that. I have blue chairs so they match regardless but if I had white chairs it probably wouldn’t look as nice together.
customer_reviews.author: malball

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and what I expected. I’d say it CAN fit 4 chairs but fits 3 chairs more comfortably. It’s a little small for my space, but that’s not a reflection of the product its self. It’s a slight off white color, so be careful when pairing it with white chairs. It’s easy as quick to put together and sturdy. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of five is because it is generic looking and obvious that it’s mass produced. We don’t use this table often, so I can’t speak to the durability and resistance to scratches and scuffs, but is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gimmeeeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, decent and beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, decent and beautiful piece. This surely compliments the space in my kitchen. It took less than hour to assemble and the manual is quite detailed. I haven't spot any downside and would certainly recommend this to friends. I have received compliments in the last hour and it feels great to finally have a decent size and affordable dining. I bought the chair on Amazon and it compliments it perfectly. 👍 Up and greatly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wooden Table
customer_reviews.text: The pictures doesn’t do it justice. It’s such a beautiful table! I selected the cappuccino color and it’s gorgeous. I’m actually using this as an accent table for my formal living room. It arrived in two separate pieces, so the pedestal comes in a different box. Super easy to put together and it really is a one person assembly. I wish they sold a coffe table just like this, so my search continues but overall this is a great investment. Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Island MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a small sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: This table comes in two boxes, one containing the top and the other box contains the feet and post. It went together well, and fits the very small space I planned to place it. I have four chairs around the table, and though they can't pull in tight to the table, it works well for a friendly game of cards or light brunch. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: fajita

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, very sturdy, easy assembly, arrived fast and on time. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I was expecting a bright white color. The picture is very deceiving making it look Bright White. Instead of calling it Linen White, it should be called Off White. When I think of Linen White, I'm thinking of my very white sheets on my bed. I already have bright white chairs and the table is off white so it does not match and they do not offer this in a Bright White color.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good little table
customer_reviews.text: Good little table for the money! I have no mechanical skills, I mean zero, ;) and I managed to put this together. However, I wish it had come with a different wrench because it was nearly impossible to tighten the legs from inside the pedestal, but again, managed fine. Comes in two boxes so if you aren't strong, it won't be an issue. Remember to check the bottom of the table skirt height with regard to the seat height of your dining chairs. I feel like the table could be a tiny bit higher but this is a minor complaint. and of course dependent on your chairs.
customer_reviews.author: CBK

customer_reviews.title: Small dining space, perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: Just right! We have been looking for a perfect table for our small dining space and we finally found it. It is affordable, easy to assemble and looks great with the dream blue distressed metal chairs. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: JS912

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Small kitchen. Needed something small but sturdy. This one fit the bill. Super easy to assemble. Took me all of 15 minutes to put it together. Helpful hint: Use a socket wrench when putting the legs on. The wrench that comes with the table is crap. Also a power drill with the right drill bit made assembly easy peasy. The color is not quite white, though for the price I'm not going to complain. A little bit of paint and it will be perfect. Would definitely recommend this to anyone! Excellent buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: DarleneSp57

customer_reviews.title: You only get part of the table
customer_reviews.text: This table is totally not what it appears to be. I only received half of the table. Who sends out half a table then ask if I would like a “discount”? The table is beautiful in the pictures. However, the company does not stand behind their product. Will load more images
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table. It fit perfectly with 4 chairs in our small breakfast nook area. The color description is linen white. It is a cream color so if you are looking for a true white table this is not. It was super easy to assemble and arrived perfectly packaged. The table top is in a separate box from the pedestal.
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: A very nice and substantial table
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and wood used in this table. The top is very attractive and the darker support and legs enhance the overall appearance. Assembly was a breeze. The table arrived in great shape, even though the exterior of the packaging showed that it had some rough travel, so kudos to the packaging designers. I would not hesitate to recommend this table to anyone looking for a more unique style.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: sturdy table!
customer_reviews.text: purchased this 36 inch table when I was downsizing to apartment living. It came quickly and I was able to put it together myself and I'm 73 years old! It took me about 20 to 30 min to put together. Its a beautiful wood table. Some say they feel the base is too small, I think it is in balance with the top. I was more than pleased how it turned out. The ordering, the shipping, the instructions to put it together.....everything was perfect...thank you Amazon! (the chair pads and lumbar pillow and table runner also came off Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryle Morey

customer_reviews.title: It's a small table, so a little light weight.
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for the breakfast nook just off my kitchen, but a little light weight, it slides a bit when you bump it the slightest. A rug underneath might stop that, but I won't deal with the mess of a rug under the table. I would have preferred bulkier legs, for more weight/stability (as well as "presence"). Still, given the price, it's a nice addition. It arrived well-packaged, all parts included, and with only the tiniest little dent in the top.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this table. The workmanship is excellent and the pieces have been cut and fitted with precision. The finish is smooth and beautiful. This is a table that was made with care.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Piece of wood on the table was broken off
customer_reviews.text: The overall table was nice and sturdy but it arrived with a piece of wood chipped off. I would like a small amount of my money refunded for the inconvenience. At least the $17.00. Its too much of a hassle to return for another one because of the weight and size of it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful table - and at a very reasonable price. It was easy to assemble. We needed a small table for a breakfast nook and didn't want to spend a lot. This looks like a much more expensive table from a furniture store. It actually matches my dining room table. I bought two chairs from the Autumn Harvest collection at Walmart online (also reasonably priced) and it matches perfectly. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a couple days ago. Set up was a breeze, my 3 year old helped with it. There was a tiny piece broken off but it's inconsequential and we may glue it on but it's not something that affects structure. We've set this up in the playroom (ages 3 and 6) as a "nook" for playing games, doing puzzles, arts and crafts, and snacks. We've used it from the moment we set it up and for nonstop hours since. It's awesome! I highly recommend it, and the price is totally affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size table for a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, it is just what I needed for small kitchen. It makes my kitchen look more spacious. Only thing is that it only has space to tucking in three chairs, but I am ok with that since I don’t have use for a fourth chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sobewell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small condo and this table is perfect. I was a little nervous about the color and the sturdiness but both wound up being exactly what I needed. It isn't a real white, but it matches the same color in my chairs. I put it together in no time and seems very sturdy. It's normally just me that sits at the table and I'm not sure if you had 4 people, but for plenty of room for 2.
customer_reviews.author: MsFixIt

customer_reviews.title: Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: The table would be great if they told you the color of the table is ivory. It is not white. I bought everything to match it, moved & built it only to find out I can’t return it and it’s not what I ordered. Great table other then it not being “white”.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Super Easy to Assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a side table for my office. It’s the perfect size and the cherry wood matched my desk and bookshelf. Moreover, this was the EASIEST assembly I’ve ever seen in a piece of furniture. All required tools are provided, and I kid-you-not...it took me all of about TEN MINUTES to assemble! It’s sturdy and gorgeous and even includes adjustable feet, which is brilliant. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JuliaDance

customer_reviews.title: A great little table for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small one bedroom apartment and this worked perfectly! Its super cute and has a really nice finish (I got the oak finish). It feels really solid. It took me less than an hour to put it together by myself. I'm not that strong and its pretty easy to flip around and move pieces around. If you're looking for something small and pretty affordable, I highly recommend this table. I also feel like it will last a long time, and that when I no longer need it, I will be able to sell it for a pretty good price!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged, box is not damaged. Disappointed but hate to go through the return process. I already assembled all but the last step when I saw the gouges on the side of table top.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie V. Wooten Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely pretty. I previously had a black solid wood table which cost about $1500 which was 20 yrs. ago. The veneer is wavy looking up close yet smooth. I love this replacement for less than $200. Be sure to protect the top with placemats or glass.
customer_reviews.author: E.Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small farmhouse kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word! This table is adorable!!! It’s small but exactly what I wanted. The color is not a bright white. It is an off white but not too creamy. I purchased black metal chairs to go with it and could not be happier with both.
customer_reviews.author: Sew D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The wood on the cappuccino color is a very rich dark stain, though I'd prefer the (more expensive) mahogany. The table seems sturdy. The assembly was so well organized, I got the table up in half an hour. My only complaint is that the table scratches and smudges easily. I've had it for less than 24 hours and barely used it at all, but it's already got scratches that would bother an OCD guy like me. I will update this review if the table doesn't hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: The Archangel

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: In general, assembly is easy (and I am not skilled in this area). However, I wish it had come with a different wrench because it is nearly impossible to tighten the legs from inside the pedestal, because the pedestal is very narrow, and all 4 screws are very close to each other. I am trying to find a ratcheting wrench,that will allow me to further tighten the leg screws.
customer_reviews.author: BEDESQUIRE

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. Very sturdy and well made. Makes a great breakfast table. We did add a glass top to protect as top is painted and dont want to get scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dsw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment. After giving my daughter my table and chairs, I needed something a little smaller. I thought quite a while before deciding I wanted a pedestal table. This 36" is perfect and the price and quality are outstanding. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not white! Dark beige color!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with overall look Perfect size! Feels very small but I wanted to be that way. I gave 4 star cuz I don’t like the color. I was hoping it would be more on the white side but it’s a darker beige but still looks good with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Cottsmariy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have a small kitchen / dinning area and not much cabinet space. I had a huge table that seated 6 before but wantes a smaller table so that i could put in an island for more storage and countertop space. The table arrived today early, and is beautiful. Super easy to put together, my 2 and 4 yr old helped.
customer_reviews.author: c.Moats

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bistro Style table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this small table for my elderly Dad -needed a small “Bistro” table for his room in assisted care with limited space. Husband put it together, with some frustration, but it looks nice in the room. The packing was good (except for the styrofoam bits that got all over the place.) Just perfect for Dad’s needs.
customer_reviews.author: Daisydee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT table for the price
customer_reviews.text: GREAT table for the price. I ordered this to replace my Dad's 4 seat table when we moved him into a smaller apartment. It is very stable and nice looking. We only have 2 chairs with it due to the small space but it could fit 4 if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug858

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table love it not set up in kitchen yet because I have a lot of painting going on and have to get chairs and floor done.thank you amazon will update photo when all is done.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.  Can't stand up to even light use.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the table and put it together, I was very pleased. I live alone. I'm the only one sitting at this table eating once a day. It has been 4 months and the top is rotating, moving every time it's touched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with this table. The table top has grain-like grooves which can make cleaning a lil difficult. Looks nice but we use a lot for many purposes. Id prefer a smooth top for cleaning purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Sub123

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The table was very easy to assemble and had clear instructions. I easily fit 4 chairs around it. I am downsizing from a larger table. It is good quality and matches my chairs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wayman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table-shocked how inexpensive it was
customer_reviews.text: I would have expected this table to be substandard related to the price. To my surprise, this table is excellent quality and exactly as described. I would have expected the price to be closer to $250-$300 maybe even more. Great size, I would get this table any day of the week. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I’m so glad I purchased it. I bought it for the break room in my office and WOW, I can’t believe the high quality look it brings to be room. I (woman) was able to put it together in about 45 minutes. The instructions are simple and very easy to follow. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful...sturdy and perfect size for a smaller area. I also purchased a glass top to protect the finish.
customer_reviews.author: BLACKDOG

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Good height and heft. Very easy to assemble, didn’t have to read the instructions. Bottom can be a little wobbly so be sure to tighten those nuts even though it’s an awkward angle
customer_reviews.author: Terrance W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described. This is not a true white but a cream white. It went well with the chairs i also bought from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, sturdy, perfect smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the bay window area of my kitchen. Small, but still plenty of space for four chairs. Gorgeous, well made and sturdy. I paired with black,cross (X) back chairs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B E

customer_reviews.title: Antique Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely stunning. The quality is great, the size is perfect and very easy to assemble! I high;y recommend purchasing this beautiful; table.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Keener

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Table!
customer_reviews.text: This table was easy to assemble with tight fittings without any problems. It matches the chairs perfectly and looks great ino ur breakfast room, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SSKG

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay table
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. I knew the measurement and I thought it would be a good size but when the actual item arrived it appeared to be smaller and shorter than i thought. Its good for tiny short person (im 5’3) or kids. It does look like kids table. If My husband (6ft) sits around the table its too tight for him. Good for now but not for a long.
customer_reviews.author: SACHIE TAKAHASHI

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Linen
customer_reviews.text: Linen white is very beige. I’m going to have to paint this table, because it looks dirty white. Do not order if you are expecting white. It is sturdy and will last a long time, but the color is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Just as seen and described
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipment. Item just as described, color is just as it appears in the picture. Stout and sturdy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. West

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Perfect size for small space. Got the cappuccino color; it is very dark brown with no red in it, but looks fine near pieces with a more cherry finish. The wood is smooth, solid and heavy, and it is stable. Looks very elegant and much more expensive than it cost. Great value. Took about an hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: elle2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Great price, beautiful table, so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table but damaged upon arriving
customer_reviews.text: I would give it more stars if the item didn't arrive partially damaged. I love this table and it was a lot cheaper here on amazon. However, there was a crack under the table. It's too heavy and too much work to make a return for this, so hopefully this crack won't affect the table functionality in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Color is off white not pure white
customer_reviews.text: The color is off white so I didn't keep it as I needed pure white. Photo on computer made it look white white. However, I from what I saw of the wood it is nice. Easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: mpinoc

customer_reviews.title: Quality and service were superb! Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Surpassed my expectations. Quality goods! I looked at so many on line. This is an excellent quality piece . Beautiful! I get lots of compliments on it. Well made and packed very well. Good directions for putting it together too.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table and awesome quality. You can’t go wrong especially this good price!! I’m so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lamos

customer_reviews.title: I most definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love it. It's the perfect size for my kitchen. It's exactly what I wanted. Exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my small space
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a larger oblong table with this round white table and I love it! I have a small space and this works perfectly. I was able to put it together myself pretty quickly without any issues. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Coiloir of table top not as pictured. Not cherry. Looking at other tables, my table has a MAHAGONY top. NOT Cherry, misleading.
customer_reviews.text: The finish on the buttermilk top is not cherry as pictured, the color is like the top of the black finish table, although both are described as cherry. My table looks more like mahogany red then cherry red. A little disappointed, although its a very nice table.
customer_reviews.author: John Irons

customer_reviews.title: So very pleased with this perfect size table
customer_reviews.text: So very pleased with this perfect size table, matches the chairs I already had. Easy to assemble all parts were in the box. They took great care to package it for safe delivery. If your looking for a small table for a small area this one will please you. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Purvis

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the price, 3 stars for the table.
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for a small space, sturdy and stable, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Joycie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!  Love the table!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table! Very beautiful! Assembling the feet to the pedestal stand was a bit difficult. Not a lot of space to work with. We ended up using our socket set to tighten up the nuts. Once we put the table together I knew it was a great purchase. I plan on buying another in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA G.

customer_reviews.title: What a beaut!
customer_reviews.text: We cannot stop looking at this table! It’s insanely beautiful and sturdy. The craftsmanship is on another level.
customer_reviews.author: Chcltmel

customer_reviews.title: SO cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously AMAZING! This table looks designer but for a fraction of the price. I paired It with A few white chairs and I couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table shape and color! It was exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for rice!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the quality of this table for our small kitchen with 2 chairs. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful furniture
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this item is really a great deal. Looks more expensive than you would think. Also perfect size for my small space.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Amos

customer_reviews.title: Happy accident.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy table, well made. Easy to assemble. Only complaint is that the color is more of an eggshell. All good because it still matches my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hawley Dudek

customer_reviews.title: Love the table perfect for my small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love the table perfect for my small kitchen. The only issue I have is that they ship the pedestool for the table separate so forewarning. I'll be putting rubber stoppers on the bottom because it's slides around on my laminate floors. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table. It's smaller than I wanted (my fault) ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. It's smaller than I wanted (my fault) but it looks great. Easy assembly but watch out for the location of the screwss in the shipping box. They are well hidden and could easily be tossed without realizing they are there!
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It is well crafted and made of real wood. The stains are true to the description, and the size is just right. Easy to assemble. I hope they also make office furniture with the same material and quality.
customer_reviews.author: For the fairest Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Really looks more expensive then it was. Really easy to put together and fits nicely in the designated space.
customer_reviews.author: Bets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful and perfect for our breakfast area. Perfect height. My old table was too low. Love the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small place
customer_reviews.text: We highly recommend it. It is beautiful and works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Frank

customer_reviews.title: Scratches
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but the top came with many scratches. I hope they can do something for me. To disassemble send back and get a replacement would be a real hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful smallish table; great quality for the price. Packed perfectly, easy to assemble. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: ksj

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wood grain
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little table. The wood grain is pretty and looks much nicer than what I was expecting. It's sturdy. perfect for a small space without being so small it's hard to get four people around it. For my family of three, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble and it looks far better quality than we’d imagined. It’s the perfect fit for our mudroom coffee nook.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Welkom

customer_reviews.title: Color is not white linen, its dingy beige.
customer_reviews.text: Says, it's white linen color..but I don't know linen to be that dingy. I had to spend money painting it. I couldn't stand the beige color.
customer_reviews.author: patty hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Im very happy with the table and recomend its look and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this table and the size is perfect for my tiny kitchen. Just wish it would of be higher. But it is a great table. Sturdy and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together took about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new table, very pretty and excellent price. However only giving three stars because of a very noticeable scratch on side skirt rim around table top, otherwise would have giving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa O

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This table is really nice, solid. Assembly was easy.A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: vivian hamstra

customer_reviews.title: Picture is not representative of color of base
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a breakfast table. It's sturdy enough, but the photo makes it look like the base is white, when in fact, it's more of a taupe color.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Thompson
